mapper.update: INSERT INTO sb_score_rank (id,user_id,total_score,rank,beat_rate) SELECT id,user_id,total_score,rank,((maxRank - rank)/maxRank) AS beat_rate FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT new.id, new.user_id, new.total_score, -- new.num_tmp, new.rank FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.total_score, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS num_tmp, @incrnum := CASE WHEN @rowtotal = a.total_score THEN @incrnum WHEN @rowtotal := a.total_score THEN @rownum END AS rank FROM ( SELECT id, user_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM sb_score GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_score DESC ) AS a, ( SELECT @rownum := 0 ,@rowtotal := NULL ,@incrnum := 0 ) r ) AS new ORDER BY rank ASC, id ASC ) aa JOIN ( SELECT MAX(bb.rank) AS maxRank FROM ( SELECT new.id, new.user_id, new.total_score, -- new.num_tmp, new.rank FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.total_score, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS num_tmp, @incrnum := CASE WHEN @rowtotal = a.total_score THEN @incrnum WHEN @rowtotal := a.total_score THEN @rownum END AS rank FROM ( SELECT id, user_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM sb_score GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_score DESC ) AS a, ( SELECT @rownum := 0 ,@rowtotal := NULL ,@incrnum := 0 ) r ) AS new ORDER BY rank ASC, id ASC ) bb ) cc ) dd
